description.value:
Your ceru familiar grants you the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Telekinetic Hand} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} cantrips via the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.rs4Awf4k1e0Mj797]{Cantrip Connection} granted ability.
If one or more of these cantrips isn't on your spell list, you can replace the cantrip or cantrips not on your spell list with a cantrip or cantrips from your spell list instead.
